resources.string: Rules of the game: there will be three figures in front of you, two below and one above, two of them will have numbers. It is necessary that the sum of the numbers from the two lower figures is equal to the number in the upper figure, To do this, you need to insert the missing number.\n\nExample: in the upper circle there is the number 7, in one from the bottom there is a question mark, and in the other the number 4. This means that in place of the question mark there should be the number 3 because 3 + 4 = 7
